testimonials.name: Rahim Ahmed
testimonials.text: CyberIT Park transformed my career. From zero to professional developer in 6 months! The instructors are amazing.

testimonials.name: Sadia Islam
testimonials.text: The project-based approach helped me build a strong portfolio that got me hired within 2 months of completion.

testimonials.name: Arif Hossain
testimonials.text: Excellent mentorship and real-world projects. Highly recommended for aspiring data scientists.

testimonials.name: Fatima Begum
testimonials.text: The React Native course was fantastic! I built 3 real apps during the course and got multiple job offers.

testimonials.name: Kamal Hossain
testimonials.text: Career support team helped me negotiate a 50% higher salary. Best investment I ever made!

testimonials.name: Nusrat Jahan
testimonials.text: From beginner to professional in just 4 months. The curriculum is perfectly structured for beginners.
